name: Arrays
description: Master the fundamentals of arrays, from simple manipulations to complex subarray problems.

name: Binary Search
description: Learn the power of divide and conquer with binary search on sorted and rotated arrays.

name: Strings
description: Tackle string manipulation, pattern matching, and parsing problems.

name: Linked List
description: Dive into singly, doubly, and circular linked lists, and solve reversal and cycle detection problems.

name: Recursion & Backtracking
description: Understand the art of solving complex problems by breaking them down into smaller, recursive steps.

name: Stacks & Queues
description: Implement and use LIFO and FIFO data structures to solve a variety of problems.

name: Heaps (Priority Queues)
description: Learn to manage and process elements based on priority using min-heaps and max-heaps.

name: Greedy Algorithms
description: Solve optimization problems by making the locally optimal choice at each step.

name: Bit Manipulation
description: Explore the power of bitwise operators to solve problems efficiently.

name: Trees
description: Master binary trees, binary search trees, and their traversals.

name: Graphs
description: Explore graph theory, traversals (BFS, DFS), and algorithms for shortest paths and cycles.

name: Dynamic Programming
description: Conquer complex problems by breaking them into overlapping subproblems and storing results.
